section.name: Out of Scope
section.description: Out of Scope for initial Beam launch. Initial launch is US only and there will be no limited free experience browsing of the app for initial launch

section.description:
For now these test cases are out of scope for Beam initial launch.
There are already test cases for My List. As for Genres, it is not yet known how Beam will be curated and what Genres will be available where.

section.description:
These were de-prioritized for initial Beam launch and will come later
These CUJs were initially created as they were part of the original P0 capabilities. The sorting and Edit features were later changed to P1, removed from original capabilities and put into these new P1 capabilities.

Content Migration - Not in Scope for Max Launch
Video Settings - Screen reader - Wifi Only Toggle button ON
Video Settings - Screen reader - Wifi Only Toggle button ON
Out Of App Promotional Rails
section.description: The new beam product will feature out of app promotional rails where we will be passing content rails from the app to the partner.

section.name: Samsung CW rail
section.description: The purpose for this task is to integrate Discovery+ content in to Samsung Universal Guide Continue Watching Feature. Our intention is to allow Samsung the ability to display Discovery+ content within the aggregated “Continue Watching” feature from outside of our App.

section.name: Amazon Partner Managed Row
section.description: Your app can send recommendations to users about the content (movies, shows, music, games) that you want them to watch. For most developers, your recommendations will appear on a shared Recommended By Your Apps row on the Amazon Fire TV home screen. For information about the shared recommendations row, see Recommendations.

section.name: Android Watch Next channel (LRAP)
section.description: As a user, I should be able to watch the recently played/ watched show in ‘Play next’ rail shown on AndroidTV Home screen so that the show would be easily accessible.

section.name: Human / Machine : ML for End Card
Title Relevance & Exploration : Watched Content Suppression: Rail level
Human / Machine : Promotion in immersive Hero
[Partner Activation] Web/STB Partner Linking Flows - Errors on Redirect
section.description: As a user I want to be messaged if I don't have an entitlement for Beam or if something goes wrong during the linking flow.

section.name: [Partner Activation] Web Partner Linking Flows - watching
section.description: As a user I want to be able to start streaming content after finishing the 'profile' step.

section.name: [Partner Activation] STB Sign In - Ready to watch
[Partner Activation] STB Content Management - Configurable flows / Partner Contracts
[Partner Activation] STB Partner Linking Flows - New Customers
Backgrounding the App
section.description: As part of feature parity, we need to support platforms that offer backgrounding of our app across devices. This allows the user to warm start the app when there is enough memory to keep our apps active in the background. When the user hits the home button on the remote and exit to the partner OS, upon returning to the app, they should be on the last screen where they left off.

section.name: Samsung Multitasking Row
section.description: Samsung has launched a new feature part of the OS called Multitasking which allows you to save the application state when the user launches another application or TV channel, and to restore it when the application is resumed. You can also monitor for changes in the visibility of your application.

section.name: Amazon Background app
section.description: Amazon allows the app to be background simply by pressing the home button on the remote

section.name: General
section.description:
Got confirmation from Dick that below attributes are not required to be seen on the client side. These are fields being managed by Data Platform for their table:
subtype typeprefix receivedtimestamp trackingcode experiment

section.name: Page Performance
section.description: Client apps need to send Performance Mark and Measures events using the Instrumentation SDK API so that page performance metrics are emitted correctly.

test.title: Standard profile user - Validate global navigation menu

custom.test_case_desc:
Note > the method to navigate and location of some of these items are different between CTV, Web, and Mobile platforms. Please refer to the Test Plan and reference Execution notes section for details.
Test Plan: https://wbdstreaming.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GQA/pages/101842945

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
And I select a standard profile
WHEN I access the menu
Then I observe the applicable &lt;menuItems&gt; listed for navigation for corresponding &lt;device&gt;
And I am able to navigate to &lt;menuItems&gt;
And I see the expected &lt;menuItems&gt; item on nav bar is highlighted for the page I navigated to for corresponding &lt;device&gt;

custom.tdata: |||:<device>|:<menuItems> || Mobile| Home, My Stuff, Downloads, Search, Movies, Series, HBO, New & Notable, My Profile || CTV| Home, My Stuff, Search, Settings, Movies, Series, HBO, New & Notable, My Profile || Desktop | My Stuff, Search, My Profile, Home, Movies, Series, HBO, New & Notable,

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user
And I select a standard profile
WHEN I access the menu
Then I observe the applicable <menuItems> listed for navigation for corresponding <device>
And I am able to navigate to <menuItems>
And I see the expected <menuItems> item on nav bar is highlighted for the page I navigated to for corresponding <device>

test.title: Remove shows from My Stuff > My List tab using asset tiles

custom.test_case_desc: See Test Plan execution notes for more details on running this test on different platforms: https://wbdstreaming.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GQA/pages/135725445/CD-132+-+My+Stuff+Test+Plan#Execution-notes-for-specific-CUJs

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
**AND** I have assets added to My List
**WHEN** I remove the My List content from My Stuff &gt; My List tab via the show cards
step.expected: //Mobile and Desktop (web) &gt; use the kebab icon on top right corner of the asset tile to expose "Remove from My List" option //CTV &gt; select tile to view content details and remove from there

step.content: **THEN** I see that particular show is removed from My Stuff &gt; My List tab
**AND** I see that particular show is removed from My List rail
GIVEN I am an authenticated user
**AND** I have assets added to My List
**WHEN** I remove the My List content from My Stuff > My List tab via the show cards
step.expected: //Mobile and Desktop (web) > use the kebab icon on top right corner of the asset tile to expose

step.content: **THEN** I see that particular show is removed from My Stuff > My List tab
**AND** I see that particular show is removed from My List rail

test.title: Authenticated new user-Verify My list functionality

custom.preconds: I log in as an first time Authenticated user or Create a New user Profile without any shows added in my list

step.content: **GIVEN** I Launch the app as new authenticated user
**WHEN** I select My Stuff
**AND** I select My List tab
**THEN** I Should see the show is added to my list and MyList Rail.
**GIVEN** I Launch the app as new authenticated user
**WHEN** I select My Stuff
**AND** I select My List tab
AND I Add to My List from any asset details page
step.expected: //should only use asset that is NOT already added to My List. May need to check state of button and only select if it is a +

step.content: **THEN** I Should see the show is added to my list and MyList Rail.

test.title: Validate Continue watching rail update behavior on Homepage

custom.preconds: User must logged in with AVOD or SVOD subscription on BEAM app

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
WHEN I watch a &lt;assetType&gt; for more than 15 seconds
AND I access the same content from Continue Watching rail on HomePage
THEN It should resume from same the point it left previously

WHEN I watch a <assetType> for more than 15 seconds
AND I access the same content from Continue Watching rail on HomePage
THEN It should resume from same the point it left previously

test.title: Validate SIGN IN with multi user profile

step.content: GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user Expected Result:
WHEN I navigate to SIGN IN screen
AND I SIGN IN with authorized multi user profile account
THEN I should land either on who's watching screen / profile picker screen or home screen with last selected profile as active profile
AND I select any profile
THEN I should land on home screen
GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user
WHEN I navigate to SIGN IN screen
AND I SIGN IN with authorized multi user profile account
THEN I should land either on who's watching screen / profile picker screen or home screen with last selected profile as active profile
AND I select any profile
THEN I should land on home screen

AND I select Sign Out

test.title: Validate Lapsed/Inactive Subscription screen when user is signed in with lapsed user account

step.content: GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user Expected Result:
WHEN I navigate to SIGN IN screen
AND I SIGN IN with lapsed/expired user account

THEN I should see Lapsed/Inactive subscription screen with these mandatory data: ‹data› ‹type›
|| | data | type || Welcome back, {name}! | text || Renew Subscription | CTA || Connect Your Provider | CTA || Need help? Visit {help url} | link
GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user
WHEN I navigate to SIGN IN screen
AND I SIGN IN with lapsed/expired user account

THEN I should see Lapsed/Inactive subscription screen with these mandatory data: ‹data› ‹type›
|| | data | type || Welcome back, {name}! | text || Renew Subscription | CTA || Connect Your Provider | CTA || Need help? Visit {help url} | link

test.title: MVPD Sign In (3rd Party Credentials)] Lapsed MVPD User Chooses to Connect to a new MVPD Provider With a New BEAM Account

custom.preconds: As a lapsed user I want to use my BEAM account so I dont lose my preferences but connect it to a different provider.

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated lapsed user

WHEN I can see Renew Subscription paywall with 2 CTA
|| | &lt;CTA&gt; || with a CTA to Subscribe || with a CTA Connect to a New Provider
AND I select “Connect” to New provider to land on sign in page
AND I select Sign In with my TV provider
THEN I Sign in to the provider IDP screen using my provider credentials
THEN I should see the Success Screen with my subscription details

test.title: MVPD Sign In (3rd Party Credentials)]New or Existing MVPD User NOT Authorized for BEAM

step.content: GIVEN I am an unauthenticated user and selected sign in
AND I click on view all the providers to load the search page
AND I select my provider, I Sign the MVPD provider with the 3rd party credentials.
AND I am not authorized
THEN I will see a “ Can’t Sign In Screen”
GIVEN I am an unauthenticated user and selected sign in
WHEN Sign-in page load option to
AND I click on view all the providers to load the search page
AND I select my provider, I Sign the MVPD provider with the 3rd party credentials.
AND I am not authorized
THEN I will see a “ Can’t Sign In Screen”

test.title: MVPD Sign In (3rd Party Credentials) Lapsed MVPD User Chooses To Renew Subscription via DTC Flow

custom.preconds: As a one time HBO Max subscriber who had access via a provider, I want to use my existing HBO Max credentials to sign in but I also want to purchase a new subscription.

step.content:
GIVEN I am an authenticated lapsed MVPD user
Note:MVPD user is authenticated through their provider and chooses to continue from the lapsed paywall.

WHEN I can see Renew Subscription paywall with 2 CTA
|| | &lt;CTA&gt; || with a CTA to Subscribe || with a CTA Connect to a New Provider
AND I select select “Subscribe”

AND I should create a Password
![](index.php?/attachments/get/6178f958-0f77-4e1f-876b-4df4cad54ce0)
step.expected: This step is descoped for Roku Launch

step.content: THEN I will land on DTC flow

test.title: Validate IAP Happy Path Purchase

custom.test_case_desc:
Step 6-7: Comcast / Cox: There isn't Create Your Account screen, has to be skipped this step. (user creates account after signs in the app)
Step 10-12: Comcast / Cox: Has to be skipped these steps because they are not applicable for these devices. The user will need to relaunch our app to be able to sign in.

step.content: GIVEN I have the BEAM App installed and I do not have a subscription
WHEN I select a Subscribe CTA on the Welcome screen

AND I am displayed a Web screen named 'Choose Your Plan' displaying Plans I can purchase
|||:Choose Your Plan || Ad-Lite || Ad-Free || Ultimate Ad-Free(Premium Plan) ||
AND I can select a Plan
AND I select 'Continue' button
step.expected: Roku / Apple TV / Android TV / Amazon Fire TV / Samsung TV / Comcast / Cox: No Continue CTA is displayed on the ‘Choose Your Plan’ screen. These platforms are directed to Create Your Account Screen by selecting a plan.

step.content:
AND I will be navigated to Create account flow based on ‹Platform›
|||:Platform|:Create account || Mobiles | ![](index.php?/attachments/get/b1611112-1f0e-4cb8-8647-b5490bbbd698) || CTV - Apple, Google, Amazon, Samsung | Scan QR code to reach Create account page on web ![](index.php?/attachments/get/43660030-9f47-464d-a564-9b16bc36e051), Enter a code on webpage to reach Create account page, ![](index.php?/attachments/get/f5e35148-5e11-445a-9199-1e87e4f98836), Use your Remote to reach Create account page on device ![](index.php?/attachments/get/c7ecbaef-b095-440c-a633-4f707a733514) || CTV - Roku | Roku pre-fill Create account screen ![](index.php?/attachments/get/d39bebaf-b625-4e69-b594-203ca573dbd7), Roku Without pre- fill ![](index.php?/attachments/get/c29b151f-6696-4f95-86c8-f1976fbe3f3f)

Find your favorites and dive into new worlds” || Email ID the customer will be using to sign in | “Sign in with: <email_address>” || Name of the plan which customer has just purchased| “Your Plan: <plan_name>” || Name of billing entity that the customer is subscribed through | “Subscribed through <billing entity>” || CTA button to put registered customer into home | "Start Streaming"

test.title: Automatic Restore Purchase

step.content: GIVEN a User has a valid subscription for BEAM, they are not Signed in and they have a receipt on their Platform
WHEN they open BEAM
THEN the User is automatically Signed in and can play BEAM content
AND no success pop-up messages are displayed
AND their Account details can be successfully viewed
GIVEN a User has a valid subscription for BEAM, they are not Signed in and they have a receipt on their Platform
WHEN they open BEAM
THEN the User is automatically Signed in and can play BEAM content
AND no success pop-up messages are displayed
AND their Account details can be successfully viewed

test.title: Authenticated User: Validating movie detail page via Movie tiles

WHEN I select the &lt; item &gt; from &lt; page &gt; page
AND I Select 'Watch Now' CTA on the movie details page
THEN the video playback starts
GIVEN I launch the Beam app as an authenticated user with no viewing history
WHEN I select the < item > from < page > page
AND I Select 'Watch Now' CTA on the movie details page
THEN the video playback starts

test.title: Authenticated User - Verify Age Rating & Content Descriptors

custom.test_case_desc:
-R&A should not display over pre-roll
-R&A should appear even if the user scrubs from pre-roll into the main feature
-R&A should display on subsequent plays in a binge.
-R&A should not display over immersive hero videos (short-preview)
PLAY-73
custom.preconds: Background: Given I open Beam experience

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
WHEN I Navigate to &lt;content&gt; on any page but the short preview on the immersive hero videos

THEN I Should see Age Ratings & Content Descriptors[Ratings & Advisories Overlay] for respective regions as applicable.
Refer to Test Data Section.

custom.tdata:
Age Ratings
Brazil- L, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18 UK- U, PG, 12A, 12, 15, 18, R18 Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway - AL, 6, 9, 12, 14, 16, 18 Germany/Austria - 0, 6, 12 Content Descriptors Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway - Crime, Fear, Disgust Please refer this Document for rest of the regions. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eeMjqGG1-hlbBl5JKKlxIg77cf0B8fLrhpL6YJp683k/edit
-------------------
|||:<content> || Episodes || Movies || Extras || Trailers/previews

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user
WHEN I Navigate to <content> on any page but the short preview on the immersive hero videos

THEN I Should see Age Ratings & Content Descriptors[Ratings & Advisories Overlay] for respective regions as applicable.
Refer to Test Data Section.

test.title: Verify user can enter PiP mode

And I start playback from an asset details page
When I background the app
Then I should see the playback continues in PIP (picture in picture) mode
GIVEN I am an authenticated user
And I start playback from an asset details page
When I background the app

THEN I observe ad playback when the video reaches the Ad Pods/ Ad Cue
AND I don't see CC
And I see the expected Ad counter experience on all platforms
step.expected:
Note : Ad counter experience = Ad badge and timer for all platforms except TVOS
Ad counter experience = Ad badge only for TVOS

WHEN I play a video with ads
AND I observe Ad Pods on the Progress bar
THEN I observe ad playback when the video reaches the Ad Pods/ Ad Cue
AND I don't see CC

Ad counter experience = Ad badge only for TVOS

test.title: Authenticated User - Validate Hidden Progress Bar, Pause/resume, Scrub Backward and Forward during Ad Playback

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated with Adlite account Expected Result:
WHEN I play a video with ads Expected Result:
AND I reach Ad-pod / Ad Cue

Then I see Ad streaming with following elements
Play/Pause button Ad counter Back button (backs out of player) FullScreen Button (web only)
AND I don't see any Progress bar & other player control
GIVEN I am an authenticated with Adlite account
WHEN I play a video with ads
AND I reach Ad-pod / Ad Cue

Then I see Ad streaming with following elements
Play/Pause button Ad counter Back button (backs out of player) FullScreen Button (web only)
AND I don't see any Progress bar & other player control

test.title: Adult pre-roll bumpers

custom.test_case_desc: Currently the bumper is an 8second long Perry Mason video (with ad badge and timer) - the content, where it should appear is the Deadliest Kids S1 E2-E3-E4

step.content:
GIVEN I am an Authenticated user with an Adlite account
Expected Result:
WHEN I select an Adult profile
AND I start to Play an asset which has Preroll ad
THEN I should see a 8sec long pre-roll bumper before the video ad plays
AND the transition between the bumper, preroll ad and the main content should be without any disruption like buffering, freezing or “blip”-ing.
GIVEN I am an Authenticated user with an Adlite account
WHEN I select an Adult profile
AND I start to Play an asset which has Preroll ad
THEN I should see a 8sec long pre-roll bumper before the video ad plays
AND the transition between the bumper, preroll ad and the main content should be without any disruption like buffering, freezing or “blip”-ing.

test.title: Adult mid-roll bumpers

custom.test_case_desc: Currently the bumper is an 8second long Perry Mason video (with ad badge and timer) - the content, where it should appear is the Deadliest Kids S1 E2-E3-E4

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated with Adlite account Expected Result:
WHEN I select an Adult profile
AND I start to Play an asset which has Midroll bumper setup (As of now "Deadliest Kids S1E4 has this setup)
THEN I should see 8 sec long mid-roll bumper(s) during the playback in place of traditional ads in an ad break
AND the transition between the content, the bumper and the main content should be without any disruption like buffering, freezing or “blip”-ing.
GIVEN I am an authenticated with Adlite account
WHEN I select an Adult profile
AND I start to Play an asset which has Midroll bumper setup (As of now
THEN I should see 8 sec long mid-roll bumper(s) during the playback in place of traditional ads in an ad break
AND the transition between the content, the bumper and the main content should be without any disruption like buffering, freezing or “blip”-ing.

test.title: Verify timeline indicators are displayed

step.content: Given I open Beam app as an authenticated user
And I have started playback from Home page

When I do &lt;action&gt;
|||:action || Invoke player controls || FWD/RWD || Move focus to MLP button

Then I should see &lt;focus location&gt; and &lt;timeline elements&gt;
|||:action |: focus location |:timeline elements || Invoke player controls |Scrubber is in focus | time remaining || FWD/RWD |Scrubber is in focus | Current time , trickplay with speed ramp and time remaining || Move focus to MLP button | MLP is in focus| time remaining
Given I open Beam app as an authenticated user
And I have started playback from Home page

When I do <action>
|||:action || Invoke player controls || FWD/RWD || Move focus to MLP button

Then I should see <focus location> and <timeline elements>
|||:action |: focus location |:timeline elements || Invoke player controls |Scrubber is in focus | time remaining || FWD/RWD |Scrubber is in focus | Current time , trickplay with speed ramp and time remaining || Move focus to MLP button | MLP is in focus| time remaining

test.title: Verify user can use scrubbing to FF/Back video

custom.test_case_desc: Clarification for step 5: CTVs will be paused during scrubbing and need to be resumed by clicking Play button

step.content: Given I open Beam app as an authenticated user
And I start playback from an asset detail page

When I use &lt;player controls&gt; on &lt;device type&gt;
|||:device type|:player controls || Mobile/Desktop | Drag the playhead || CTV | press/hold the left/right d-pad
step.expected:
If the user holds the dpad right or left button for 2 sec, the controls will enter the FFW/RWD mode and we will trigger the FFW/RWD action with speed = 1x (15 sec)
After that,
Tapping right jumps you up a speed
Tapping left jumps you down a speed
Tapping right once you're already at #4 does nothing
Tapping left from a 1x speed it would go to 0x = Play i.e normal speed
Pressing Back during FFW/RWD action, then the current playhead position will be canceled and we will take the user back to the starting point for the FFW/RWD action. (i.e. Cancels the FFW/RWD seek)

step.content:
And I perform &lt;action&gt; on &lt;device type&gt;
|||:device type|:action || Mobile/Desktop | release playhead || CTV | Pressing OK/Select
step.expected: CTV Pressing OK/Select, then the current playhead position will be accepted and the FFW/RWD action will stop.

step.content: Then playback session will resume again from the new position in the Seek bar (see clarification for step 5 above)
Given I open Beam app as an authenticated user
And I start playback from an asset detail page

When I use <player controls> on <device type>
|||:device type|:player controls || Mobile/Desktop | Drag the playhead || CTV | press/hold the left/right d-pad
step.expected:
If the user holds the dpad right or left button for 2 sec, the controls will enter the FFW/RWD mode and we will trigger the FFW/RWD action with speed = 1x (15 sec)
After that,
Tapping right jumps you up a speed
Tapping left jumps you down a speed
Tapping right once you're already at #4 does nothing
Tapping left from a 1x speed it would go to 0x = Play i.e normal speed
Pressing Back during FFW/RWD action, then the current playhead position will be canceled and we will take the user back to the starting point for the FFW/RWD action. (i.e. Cancels the FFW/RWD seek)

step.content:
And I perform <action> on <device type>
|||:device type|:action || Mobile/Desktop | release playhead || CTV | Pressing OK/Select
step.expected: CTV Pressing OK/Select, then the current playhead position will be accepted and the FFW/RWD action will stop.

step.content: Then playback session will resume again from the new position in the Seek bar (see clarification for step 5 above)

test.title: Verify default quality of downloads

custom.test_case_desc:
Video Quality: Highest Quality Option should be capped at 1080p, good - 720p, in between - 840p. Can be tested by downloading same episode with different video quality option (Good, Better,Best) and comparing the size of the each file. Storage of 1 hr of video (with single audio track included) should not exceed 0.891 GB Speed: 1m30s / hr should be on fastest setting. There is no particular values for medians/averages , however 5m should become user concern
In test case above: default download settings is: Quality good - 720; Speed - fastest 1,5 m/hr

When I download an asset via asset detail page

And on Video settings page Downloads settings set to default
When I download an asset via asset detail page

WHEN I navigate to account Page

AND I navigate to different sub-navigation items
|||:Platform|:Validation || Web | ![](index.php?/attachments/get/9a4e9fb2-98ef-48c4-b77e-88529cc4118a) Edit profile, Settings, Account, Subscription, Privacy and terms, Help, Sign Out || Mobile | ![](index.php?/attachments/get/fbd60686-1b61-4aea-93a0-edba8b6087e1) App settings, Account, Subscription, Privacy & Terms, Help, Sign Out || CTV | ![](index.php?/attachments/get/05b096da-88ed-4009-b570-06222c1ae265) Play back, Account, Subscription, Privacy and Terms, Help, Info, Sign out, Note: Manage profile should separate option on CTV

WHEN I navigate to account Page

test.title: Authenticated user can able to access Manage devices from Account tab

custom.preconds: Background GIVEN I open Beam app

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
WHEN I select an Adult Profile Expected Result:
AND I navigate to Account Screen Expected Result:
AND I Select Account Tab
AND I select Devices
THEN I should be taken to Manage devices screen where it will have all details about signed in devices
GIVEN I am an authenticated user
WHEN I select an Adult Profile
AND I navigate to Account Screen
AND I Select Account Tab
AND I select Devices
THEN I should be taken to Manage devices screen where it will have all details about signed in devices

test.title: Standard Profile Creation

step.content: Given I am an Authenticated user
WHEN I am on the Who is watching/Manage profile screen
AND I select the Add Profile CTA
AND I select a Profile Picture

AND I add a &lt;Name&gt;
|||:Name || 1 Character || Less than 14 Characters || Name that complies with requirements ||

AND I add &lt;special_characters&gt; to the name field
|||Special Characters || spaces () || period (.) || comma (,) || single quote (') || dash (-) || underscore (_) || pound sign (#)
AND I select the Save CTA
THEN I should be directed to the Who is watching screen.
Given I am an Authenticated user
WHEN I am on the Who is watching/Manage profile screen
AND I select the Add Profile CTA
AND I select a Profile Picture

AND I add a <Name>
|||:Name || 1 Character || Less than 14 Characters || Name that complies with requirements ||

AND I add <special_characters> to the name field
|||Special Characters || spaces () || period (.) || comma (,) || single quote (') || dash (-) || underscore (_) || pound sign (#)
AND I select the Save CTA
THEN I should be directed to the Who is watching screen.

test.title: Kids Profile Creation and Validation of content

step.content: GIVEN I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
AND I am on the Who's Watching Screen / Profile Picker Screen
WHEN I start to create a new user profile
step.expected: note: kids mode off by default

step.content: AND I toggle the kid's profile button in the ON state for it to become a kids profile
AND I select the newly created kids' profile
THEN I should see filtered kids only content on all relevant screens
GIVEN I am an authenticated user
AND I am on the Who's Watching Screen / Profile Picker Screen
WHEN I start to create a new user profile
step.expected: note: kids mode off by default

step.content: AND I toggle the kid's profile button in the ON state for it to become a kids profile
AND I select the newly created kids' profile
THEN I should see filtered kids only content on all relevant screens

test.title: PIN Validation

custom.preconds: Pre-conditions applies to ALL platforms except web: 1. Existing BEAM active user 2. Set PIN on web platform

step.content: GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user Expected Result:
When I am an authenticated user Expected Result:
**AND** I create a profile PIN
step.expected: Note: This step is applicable for Web only

step.content: **AND** I select any locked profile on who's watching screen and I enter the correct PIN
**THEN** the user profile should be unlocked and I should land to the home screen
GIVEN I launch Beam app as an unauthenticated user
When I am an authenticated user
**AND** I create a profile PIN
step.expected: Note: This step is applicable for Web only

step.content: **AND** I select any locked profile on who's watching screen and I enter the correct PIN
**THEN** the user profile should be unlocked and I should land to the home screen
